entry.title: $2599 // PRIVATE BALCONY----LUX 1 BED----VIEWS OF NYC SKYLINE
entry.content:
PRIVATE BALCONY----LUX 1 BED----VIEWS OF NYC SKYLINE

Listing ID #: 169768
Price: $2,599
Property Type: Apartment
Bedrooms: 1.0
Bathrooms: 1.0
Approx. Size: 600 Sq. Ft.

Building Amenities

Elevator
Garage

Apartment Amenities

Balcony
City View
Dishwasher
Eat In Kitchen
Granite Kitchen
Hardwood
High Ceilings
Marble Bath
Open View
Outdoor Space
Patio
Private Deck
Renovated
Terrace
Walk In Closet

Brand new luxurious 1 bedroom 1 bathroom apartment in the heart of Astoria. Enjoy your own private balcony for barbecuing or head upstairs to the roof terrace to see amazing views of Manhattan and Queens. Lovely patio furniture is available on terrace for lounging in the summer time. Amazing stainless steel appliances with heated floors! Also including floor to ceiling windows which you do not see often. Bathroom has marble bath and kitchen has granite counter top. Laundry is available in the building. Located in prime Astoria just minutes away from all the popular lounges, restaurants, cafes, shopping stores and much much more. Q18 bus and N/W train are minutes away. 8 minutes from midtown Manhattan.

For viewings please call or text Shah at 646-717-1832 or email at [email protected]
